subject: Science
title: Why Evolution Was Controversial
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Why Evolution Was Controversial.

hook.text: When Darwin published, Bishop Wilberforce asked if he descended from an ape on his mother's or father's side.

buildup.text: Evolution contradicted the belief that species were created fixed and unchanging.

discovery.text: The idea that humans share ancestors with apes was deeply unsettling to Victorian society.

twist.text: Darwin never said humans came from monkeys. He said we share a common ancestor.

climax.text: Within a generation, most scientists accepted evolution. The evidence was overwhelming.

punchline.text: We don't descend from monkeys. We're cousins. There's a difference.

quiz.question: What did Darwin actually propose about humans and apes?
options: Apes are less evolved forms of humans
